featured.text: The evolution of traffic control systems.
During the process of evolution, man has shown remarkable ability to to the environment.

definition.zh_def: 演化；生物隨時間變化和適應的過程。
definition.en_def: The process by which different kinds of living organisms develop and change over time through natural selection and genetic variation.
definition.example: The theory of evolution explains how species adapt to their environments over millions of years.
